item.title: Nexus
item.description: docker 설치 sudo apt install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu bionic stable" sudo apt update sudo apt install docker-ce -y nexus 실행 sudo docker volume create --name nexus-data sudo docker run -d -p 8081:8081 --name nexus -v nexus-data:/nexus-data sonatype/nexus3 nexus bash 실행 sudo docker exec -it 7f1dc6675c11 /bin/bash [[Docker Volume]]
